item.title: ACSS Surveillance Processor (STC ST02053LA) – Automatic Dependent Surveillance-Broadcast (ADS-B) Functionality (EFB Installed)

numlitem.para: It is not required by FAR,
Procedures do not require its use, and
Merging & Spacing and CAVS operations are prohibited.

note.para: If ADS-B is installed in lieu of or as a replacement for FAR required equipment, repair category in operator's MEL will be the same as that of FAR required equipment.

numlitem.para: Operate TCAS in transponder-only mode by selecting TCAS Mode Selector to XPNDR position.

note.para: Contact Dispatch for operational requirements for foreign states.

numlitem.para: Merging & Spacing and CAVS operations are prohibited.

placard.para: Placard EFB(s) "ADS-B INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
